featured.text: From the late 1850s until his death in 1910, Winslow Homer produced a body of work distinguished by its thoughtful expression and its independence from artistic conventions.

definition.zh_def: 獨立；自主，特別是指不受他人控制或影響的狀態。
definition.en_def: The state of being free from the control or influence of others.
definition.example: The country gained its independence after years of struggle.
